outputs.output_descr: Capacity Building Support to National Environment and Climate Change Fund (FONERWA) to manage short, medium and long term the fund throughout evolving knowledge and capacity building.  The programme will enhance capacity that complement the fund management team (FMT) under the center for International Development and training (CIDT) support and beyond.
UNDP/UNEP Poverty and Environment Initiative Rwanda Programme

Ecosystem Rehabilitation and Protection for Pro-poor Green Growth Programme, is 5 years programme aiming to provide assistance to the Rwanda Environment Management Authority towards achieving its statutory mandate of identifying the fragile ecosystem. The programme will support innovative approaches to restore fragile island and wetlands ecosystem, promote sustainable management of natural resources and support the livelihood diversification to enhance household incomes and reduce the number of people depend on subsistence agriculture.

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: Strengthening the institutional capacity of the Ministry of Natural Resources in Rwanda

project_descr: Support to Sustainable Environmental Management and Disaster Risk Management
project_title: Support to Sustainable ENV Management and DRM
